sentences.english: Costs of repairs may be reimbursed.
You have to account to the accountant tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 你明天得去向會計報賬。

sentences.english: But the process is too cumbersome to hold governments to account.
sentences.chinese: 但是這一過程程序太過繁瑣，很難能讓政府報賬。

sentences.english: I'm not going to put my lot in with economists.
sentences.chinese: 我不打算跟經濟學家們報賬。

sentences.english: Enter the correct bar code and press "OK" button, it will display reimbursement success.
sentences.chinese: 輸入正確的條碼後按《確認》鍵，就會顯示報賬成功。
